body_html:
That indeed seems to be at least a discrepancy between the documentation of tf.train.Server and the behavior.

@suharshs : Mind taking a look? It seems that tf.Session(target) in Python ends up sending a CreateSession RPC with CreateSessionRequest.config based on the options provided the tf.Session constructor. This means that the default provided to tf.train.Server was ignored. Which might be okay? But perhaps something needs to be cleaned up (either we don't have a "default" for the server, or we use it?)

FYI @mrry
